name: Anarchy Thumbnails
description: Adds Chaotic thumbnails to levels in search.

thumbnailButton.name: Enable Anarchy Thumbnail Button
thumbnailButton.description: Adds a <cj>button</c> in the <cy>Level Page</c> that lets you view the anarchy thumbnail of the level you are currently on.

cache-limit.name: Cache Limit
cache-limit.description: The amount of anarchy thumbnails that are cached in memory (Lower this if you have a low amount of available memory).
